constituent: hemp, cave, grove, tree, wood, tree2, wood2
heisigStory: Cave . . . grove. If it helps, this is the hemp marijuana comes from.
koohiiStory1: (Image: while Batman is out, Robin is smokin´ a huge doob in a secret corner of the Batcave where he nurtures his hemp grove).
koohiiStory2: Where is the best place to hid your grove of hemp trees? In a cave, you dope!
myStory: cây đay, lanh, gai. rừng dưới mái chéo
